note: Time for a proper introduction. I am a literature teacher, mostly retired. I love reading, music, baking, nature & cats. I am learning to boost a lot, which includes my passion for a truly inclusive world, so lots of support for Black, Indigenous, LGBTQIA+, Women, Working Class, & other rights. I understand users who want Mastodon to be a quiet corner, but I am more concerned about what happens if we look the other way when people suffer.
tbd

Feral outlaw and natural anarchist not often inclined to do as I'm told. I am a student of anarchists, free spirits and self-organisers throughout culture and history.

This account is supportive of gender diversity and for freedom of consenting sexualities. I am pro slut, anti-capitalist and a promoter of cooperative promiscuity.

An intrepid explorer, navigating the often hostile lands of consumerism, to find the least awful options among vast swathes of unsustainable products and services that we use on a daily basis.
Come with me on a journey of discovery, for #sustainable #green #eco-friendly choices in a landscape of green washed, carbon offset pitfalls.
As we know, there is no ethical consumption under capitalism, but we sure can try!
